name: SpiderAttack (KSK Studio)
description:
Our world is  attacked by the Robotic Spider! Attack back the Spiders to protect our World!

In our beautiful planet, there were many humans and animals living peacefully, but one day the unknown space ship was pass through our planet.It drops down a robotic alien Spider.Then Peoples are very scared and tried to kill it, but the strange things was happened.The spider spawn many spiders and attack the people.Then every humans and animals were swiped out and you are the only one who left on the world and you only have a safe zone, but aliens found your base and tried to attack you. Now protect your self and our world!
